  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Frame()
    constructor of frame which sets frame to fullscreen, positions the field based on screen size sets the buttons and gets the chips of the players bet

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void deleteTextfields()
    tree labels per player are created and the text set depending on the players data
    void handleButtonAction​(java.lang.String button)
    The text is checked and the corresponding action called

    returns if draw is ready

    void keyTyped​(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
    keyEvents that could cause issues to the program are handled
    void setButtons()
    the buttons to perform the game actions are displayed, and their ActionListeners are added, with stand the player cannot take another card, hit he takes another card, split he gets two hands and double he doubles his bet and automatically gets another card
    void setJButtons​(javax.swing.JButton bt)
    style of button is set and a MouseListener added to change the color when hovered over it
    private void setLabel​(int index)

    tree labels per player are created and the text set depending on the players data

    the label of the bet is set to the players bet the labels turn red when its the players turn
